comment: As I go about my normal morning routine and see people along the way , I'm not sure how many realize how close we were to all out war last evening . Had Iran truly killed dozens of American soldiers while sleeping in their barracks , Iran would have been annihilated last night . <URL>

comment: I d say very few ; it s a tragedy and a privilege to be that oblivious , I suppose .
